enWisdom: The bane of might is aggression and defiance
The vilest oppression is [that which is practiced] when one has power
Hope misleads and transgression strikes down
Oppression takes away blessing
Oppression leads to destruction
Oppression causes the downfall of men and brings [their] deaths closer

Wisdom: إِيَّاكُمْ وَصَرَعَاتِ الْبَغْيِ وَفَضَحَاتِ الْغَدْرِ وَإِثَارَةِ كَامِنِ الشَّرِّ الْمُذَمِّمِ
enWisdom: Avoid the downfalls of transgression, the disgraces of deceit and the arousal of the latent, reprehensible evil
When the king becomes enraged, Satan takes control [over him]
NULL
Whoever obtains [great wealth or power] becomes overbearing
One who shows haughtiness is crushed
NULL

Wisdom: مَنْ سَلَّ سَيْفَ الْبَغْيِ غُمِدَ فِي رَأْسِهِ
enWisdom: Whoever unsheathes the sword of oppression [on the people], his head becomes its sheath
NULL
How quick is the downfall of a tyrant!

Wisdom: مَا أَعْظَمَ وِزْرَ مَنْ ظَلَمَ وَاعْتَدَى وَتَجَبَّرَ وَ طَغَى
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: مَا أَقْرَبَ النَّقِمَةَ مِنْ أَهْلِ الْبَغْيِ وَالْعُدْوَانِ
enWisdom: How close is the punishment of Allah to the oppressors (or the unjust) and wrongdoers!

Wisdom: وَيْلٌ لِلْبَاغِينَ مِنْ أَحْكَمِ الْحَاكِمِينَ وَعَالِمِ ضَمَائِرِ الْمُضْمِرِينَ
enWisdom: NULL
There is no victory with oppression

Wisdom: دَعِ الِانْتِقَامَ فَإِنَّهُ مِنْ أَسْوَءِ أَفْعَالِ الْمُقْتَدِرِ وَلَقَدْ أَخَذَ بِجَوَامِعِ الْفَضْلِ مَنْ رَفَعَ نَفْسَهُ عَنْ سُوءِ الْمُجَازَاةِ
enWisdom: Do away with revenge, for indeed it is from the worst actions of the powerful, and he who raises himself above the evil of reprisals has taken hold of the accumulation of merits
The most revolting act of a powerful person is revenge

Wisdom: الْمُبَادَرَةُ إِلَى الِانْتِقَامِ مِنْ شِيَمِ اللِّئَامِ
enWisdom: Rushing to take revenge is from the traits of the wicked
Evil retribution [and revenge] is from the vileness of victory

Wisdom: مَنِ انْتَقَمَ مِنَ الْجَانِي أَبْطَلَ فَضْلَهُ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَفَاتَهُ ثَوَابُ الْآخِرَةِ
enWisdom: Whoever takes revenge on the wrongdoer nullifies his merit in this world and loses the reward of the Hereafter
There is no eminence with vengeance
